title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 410.12 - Retention of receipts or statements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 410.12 - Retention of receipts or statements

State Regulations

Each mortgage banker and mortgage broker shall retain until
completion of its next examination the originals of any and all receipts and/or
statements obtained from a depository pursuant to the deposit agreement
referred to in section
410.11
of this Part as well as
copies of any and all withdrawal requests and the certificate given to a
depository pursuant to the deposit agreement referred to in section
410.11
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
410.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
